comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Part of the Cubs' Tinker to Evers to Chance double play combination. Ogden Nash commented poetically on his jutting jaw: Line-Up for Yesterday E is for Evers, His jaw in advance; Never afraid to Tinker with Chance. — Ogden Nash, Sport magazine (January 1949) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johnny_Evers
